original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā vesāliyam viharati mahā vane kūṭāgāra sālāya

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sabbapaṁsukūliko susāne viharati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ bhikkhu sabba pasukūlikaḥ susāne viharati

original: So manussehi diyyamānaṁ na icchati paṭiggahetuṁ, susānepi rukkhamūlepi ummārepi ayyavosāṭitakāni sāmaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjati.
analyzed: saḥ manussehi diyyamānam naḥ icchati paṭiggahetu susāne pi rukkha mūle pi ummāre pi ayya vosāṭitakāni sāmam gahetvā paribhuñjati

original: “kathañhi nāma ayaṁ bhikkhu amhākaṁ ayyavosāṭitakāni sāmaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayam bhikkhu amhākam ayya vosāṭitakāni sāmam gahetvā paribhuñjissati

original: Theroyaṁ bhikkhu vaṭharo manussamaṁsaṁ maññe khādatī”ti.
analyzed: theraḥ ayam bhikkhu vaṭharaḥ manussa masam maññe khādati iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āharissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhu adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āharissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āharasī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhikkhu adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āharasi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āharissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āharissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āhareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āhareyya pācittiyanti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū udakadantapone kukkuccāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū udaka danta pone kukkuccāyanti
anujānāmi bhikkhave udaka danta ponam sāmam gahetvā paribhuñjitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āhareyya, aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āhareyya aññatra udaka danta ponā pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā dente hatthapāse ṭhito kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti, etaṁ dinnaṁ nāma.
analyzed: kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā dente hattha pāse ṭhitaḥ kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti etam dinnam nāma

original: udakadantaponaṁ ṭhapetvā yaṁ kiñci ajjhoharaṇīyaṁ, eso āhāro nāma.
analyzed: udaka danta ponam ṭhapetvā yam kiñci ajjhoharaṇīyaḥ eṣaḥ āhāraḥ nāma
khādissāmi bhuñjissāmi iti gaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Appaṭiggahitake appaṭiggahitakasaññī adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: appaṭiggahitake appaṭiggahitaka saññī adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āhāreti aññatra udaka danta ponā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Appaṭiggahitake vematiko adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a paṭiggahitake vematikaḥ adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āhāreti aññatra udaka danta ponā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Appaṭiggahitake paṭiggahitakasaññī adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: appaṭiggahitake paṭiggahitaka saññī adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āhāreti aññatra udaka danta ponā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: cattāri mahāvikaṭāni sati paccaye asati kappiyakārake sāmaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjati,
analyzed: cattāri mahā vikaṭāni sati paccaye asati kappiya kārake sāmam gahetvā paribhuñjati
